name: HYATT house Miami Airport

reviews.text: We stayed here the night before our cruise. This is a great hotel and I would stay here again. We had a one bedroom suite for our family (2 adults and 2 kids). It was great to have the extra room after a long day of flying. The room was clean and new. The staff was friendly. We had a small wait for the shuttle van at the airport but not that bad. The breakfast in the morning had enough to choose from. Not a huge selection but everything was replenished quickly and was fresh.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: There is a grocery store about a 5 minute walk away.
reviews.title: Nice spacious rooms, great staff service

reviews.text: This hotel was great, from the staff at the front desk, to the layout of the rooms, and the breakfast in the morning.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hyatt Summerfield Suites for a week and really enjoyed it. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful, the rooms (all with a separate kitchen/living with a new flat screen tv) are spacious and nicely furnished. Then there is to mention that unlike many other hotels in same area (the Sofitel being one) at the Hyatt the do not charge extra for car parking, in-room wifi as well as an adequate breakfast. The vicinity to the international airport causes no annoyance and you cannot hear any plane starting or landing.
reviews.title: you get much more than what you pay for!

likes.liked: — Spacious clean rooms and excellent price.

reviews.text: Summing up: going to the Hyatt Summerfield Suites is definitely a no brainer: you get much, much more for your bucks!
reviews.title: Simply The Best Suites Ever!

reviews.text: After reading the reviews from Tripadvisor I went with Hyatt Summerfield Suites in Miami to book reservations for the day before and the day after our cruise. I am so glad I took the advise from the users of Tripadvisor! We had a wonderful stay. Our stay at the suites was better than our cruise! Everything about our stay was great. The front-desk people were wonderful, particularly Jannesse, and the shuttle service was more than we expected. Not only did we get a free ride from and to the airport, but the driver also offered to take us to restaurants around the suites. We also used Liebt Way Tours to transfer us to the port, we later used their services to take us on a tour to Southbeach. Driver Paulo was very nice to us and accomomodated us in ever way. We felt like royalty our whole stay. The breakfast and happy hour food was fantastic. The suites are beautifully decorated and very roomy for my family of five, which consist of a 11 and 13 year old. We travel alot and this was definitely the best stay ever! Please trust me and others who have written in, you will be pleasantly surprised!
reviews.title: A great place to stay

likes.liked: — very quiet, nice area, close to grocery store, excellent value

reviews.text: A friend and I took advantage of a special web offer for an upgrade to a 2 King room unit for a very small amount per day. We were very happy with the hotel. It is in a very nice area next to a small shopping centre that had a large grocery store. The hotel was exceptionally quiet, especially for an "airport" hotel. It was only one storey and the rooms were great. The unit had full sized appliances and was well equipped. It was also in a good location for the areas we visited and near to the major roads. We were very happy during our four day stay. The staff were great as was the hot and cold free breakfast buffet.
reviews.title: Good choice for a layover/near the airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent the night of a layover here and it was perfect for my needs. They have a free airport shuttle during most of the day - it's 5 mins from the airport - or you can take a $14 taxi in off-hours. The rooms are clean and comfortable - all low-budget/basic decorations and fixtures - but just fine. The free breakfast is fairly extensive given the price of the room. What I really loved was the healthy and organic food choices in their mini-grocery store!!
reviews.title: Great for a stopover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Summerfield Suites on Feb. 1-2, 2008 before leaving on a cruise. We called the hotel to request the free shuttle pickup and after a short wait we were greeted by Alberto the driver who was very friendly. Since our flight was arriving early I had requested early check-in and when we arrived at the hotel we were checked in and Alberto helped us with our luggage to our room. Unfortunately when we walked into the room it smelled of cigarette smoke which was unacceptable to us and Alberto called down to the front desk, got our room changed, went downstairs to get the key for our new room and moved our luggage to our new room which was smoke free and very nice. It was a one bedroom which was very clean. It was great having a kitchen with a refrigerator that we could use to store water and soft drinks and a microwave to heat up leftover food from the restaurant we ate at. There was a TV and DVD in the living room area and a TV in the bedroom. The breakfast was great and had a nice variety of items to chose from - scrambled eggs, french toast, bacon, sausages, bagels, english muffins, toast, danishes, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereals, juices, milk, coffee and tea - much more then we expected from a continental breakfast. The shuttle was also available to take us to the shopping center which was nearby and picked us up. Alberto asked us if we needed a ride to the cruise ship dock and he made the arrangements to have the shuttle pick us up and take us to the ship for a nominal charge.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The suites are vast: an adequate-size kitchen with very modern and big appliances, adequate cooking implements (the counter would make it difficult for more than two adults to have a meal without being crowded). The bedrooms have excellent bedding, with plenty of shelves and drawers for clothes. Each bedroom of the two bedroom suite has excellent bedding, its own big bathroom, and a good size desk with a superbly supportive office chair so you can work in comfort.

aka: Hyatt Summerfield Suites - Miami Airport Hotel Miami
description: The Hyatt House Miami Airport is the best choice when travelling to Miami. Whether you are passing through on your way to a cruise, on vacation to see the sites, on short term business, or even on long term stays. The property is conveniently located just 2 miles from the airport, close enough to have a complimentary shuttle, but far enough to give one a feel different from an airport hotel. We are located equal distances from the beaches and some of the most popular shoopping venues of Miami. At the same time, you can easily go east and tour Biscayne Bay, or go west into the Everglades and see an alligator show. We have the most spacious suites in town, equipped with a complete kitchen. Our hot breakfast is second to none in the area, and it is complimentary, as is the social hour we host Monday through Thursday at our guest house, where you can enjoy complimentary appetizers, soft drinks, beer and wine.The staff at the Hyatt House Miami is anxious to welcome you and I look forward to meeting you in person.Gody Almonte, General Manager.
